results.title: Combined Administration of Pravastatin and Metformin Attenuates Acute Radiation-Induced Intestinal Injury in Mouse and Minipig Models
results.text_hl: Furthermore, in minipig models, combined treatment with @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@PS@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ ameliorates gross @DISEASE_Fractures_Spontaneous @DISEASE_MESH:D005598 @@@pathological damage@@@ in abdominal organs and attenuated @DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@-induced intestinal @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_by_Histologic_Type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009370 @@@histological damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim JM, Kim H, Oh SH, Jang WI, Lee SB, Park M, Kim S, Park S, Shim S, Jang H. Combined Administration of Pravastatin and Metformin Attenuates Acute Radiation-Induced Intestinal Injury in Mouse and Minipig Models Int J Mol Sci. 2022 Nov 27;23(23):. PMID: 36499155

results.title: Involvement of catalase in the protective benefits of metformin in mice with oxidative liver injury.
results.text_hl: Our results showed that treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly attenuated CCl2-induced elevation of serum aminotransferases and @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_by_Histologic_Type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009370 @@@hepatic histological abnormalities@@@.

citations.NLM: Dai J, Liu M, Ai Q, Lin L, Wu K, Deng X, Jing Y, Jia M, Wan J, Zhang L. Involvement of catalase in the protective benefits of metformin in mice with oxidative liver injury. Chem Biol Interact. 2014 Jun 5;216():34-42. PMID: 24717679

results.title: Metformin alleviated endotoxemia-induced acute lung injury via restoring AMPK-dependent suppression of mTOR.
results.text_hl: The results indicated that treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ suppressed @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@-induced upregulation of @GENE_IL6 @GENE_16193 @@@IL-6@@@ and @GENE_TNF @GENE_21926 @@@TNF-alpha@@@, alleviated @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_by_Histologic_Type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009370 @@@pulmonary histological abnormalities@@@, improved the survival rate of @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@-challenged @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Wu K, Tian R, Huang J, Yang Y, Dai J, Jiang R, Zhang L. Metformin alleviated endotoxemia-induced acute lung injury via restoring AMPK-dependent suppression of mTOR. Chem Biol Interact. 2018 Aug 1;291():1-6. PMID: 29859833
